results.brief_description: Primo & Secondo, two immigrant brothers, pin their hopes on a banquet honoring Louis Prima to save their struggling restaurant.

results.title: Big night
results.creator_credit: Stanley Tucci, Campbell Scott, Jonathan Filley, Rysher Entertainment and Timpano Productions
results.brief_description: A treat for movie and food lovers everywhere, this multi-award winning comedy tells the story of two Italian brothers (Primo and Secondo), whose superb restaurant is on the brink of bankruptcy. Their only chance is to risk everything they own on one big night where they invite local identities and band leader Louis Prima to a six course, twenty-two dish feast that will either make or break them. Cast includes Ian Holm, Tony Shalhoub, Stanley Tucci, Isabella Rossellini and Minnie Driver.

results.title: Big military parade = Da yue bing
results.brief_description: Four hundred volunteers, many of them fresh recruits still in their teens come to a training camp for eight months of intensive drilling. The film focuses on four of the young squaddies and two of the officers, looking at the ways they bond and split apart, but also at their most intimate feelings: their sense of physical inadequacy, for instance, or their hypocrisy in presenting an exterior they know to be false. It’s surprisingly humane and moving. There are images here whose power and grace burn themselves into the mind. In Mandarin with English subtitles.

results.title: Big Mal (Malcolm Allison) - Soccer

Episode of Series “Sports Action Profile”.
Presents a look at the life and work of Malcolm Allison, coach of the Manchester City (England) soccer team.

results.title: Big Little Lies
results.brief_description: The tale of three mothers of first graders whose apparently perfect lives unravel to the point of murder.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

constellations_other.name: Storyboards to Academy Awards
constellations_other.description: Storyboards allow filmmakers, showrunners and game designers to visualise and communicate how their stories will look on-screen.

results.title: Big lies of the 20th Century
results.creator_credit: Tomasz Malinowski, Michael Jones, Channel Four and Panoptic Productions
results.brief_description: An examination of some of this Century’s significant acts of censorship. The emphasis of the program is how film has been manipulated to support political propaganda including Nazi Germany, the Vietnamese Conflict, during Stalin’s reign in the Soviet Union and the anti-communist trials in the United States. This is an invaluable program for showing how history and the media can conspire to make the process of seeking the truth more difficult.

results.title: Big Henry and the polka dot kid
results.creator_credit: Richard Marquand, Linda Gottlieb and Learning Corporation of America
results.brief_description: Presents an adaptation of the novel ‘Luke Baldwin’s Vow’ by Morley Callaghan, about a ten year old orphan boy who goes to live with his aunt and uncle in rural Canada. Shows how the boy’s love for an old blind dog leads to conflict with his uncle who feels that the animal is impractical to keep.
